mapper.insert: insert into QUIZ_TYPE (ID, NAME, EXTRA1, EXTRA2, EXTRA3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
